title: Understanding the Mourning Period
text: In Jewish tradition, there is a specific term for the seven-day mourning period observed by family and friends after a loved one passes away. This period is marked by specific rituals and customs.

title: Exploring Jewish Mourning Customs
text: The seven-day mourning period is a time for family and friends to come together, share memories, and support each other. This period is an important part of Jewish mourning customs.

title: Identifying the Term
text: What is the term used in Jewish tradition for the seven-day mourning period?
